name: Risk: Wall Edition
description:
Game Description:

Risk: Wall Edition is a local multiplayer game (2- 6 players), you play the role of a dictator, fighting against other dictators to conquer the world. Using your knowledge and strategic thinking, you must fight and complete your tasks to win the game. 

Team Members:
  • Joris Kamminga
  • Joep Bohlken
  • Pascal Duits
  • Scott Pols
  • Eric van der Ven
Key features of the game:
  • Learning aspect
  • Multiplayer
  • Fun & Interactive Attacking Mechanic
How To Play:

The game is self explanatory

  • Choose your team colors and start the game.
  • You’re given random countries and cards with tasks on them.
  • The first team to finish all tasks wins the game.
  • Complete all your objectives to win.
